CtaSection2.title: Commit to a sustainable future with Internxt!

FeatureSectionV2.title: Managing our environmental impactwith green cloud computing
FeatureSectionV2.description: Internxt encourages innovation by promoting sustainable practices in cloud infrastructure without compromising performance or reliability.

element1.title: Renewable energy
element1.description: Our data center uses renewable energy to reduce carbon emissions, conserve energy, and minimize e-waste, helping businesses lower their environmental impact and preserve the worldâ€™s natural resources.

element2.title: Increased savings
element2.description: We only use energy-efficient data centers that minimize hardware needs, lower operational expenses, and increase utility cost savings, which aligns with our eco-friendly goals.

element3.title: Efficiency
element3.description: Our data centers are ISO50001 certified and participate in the European Code of Conduct for Energy Efficiency in Data Center, the internationally recognized standard for energy management.

element4.title: European Green Capital 2024
element4.description: Based in Valencia, Internxt is inspired by the city's sustainability efforts, driving our own green initiatives through eco-friendly cloud storage solutions.

FeatureSectionV3.title: Managing our environmental impact
FeatureSectionV3.description: Internxt leads by example in working for a more sustainable future through energy-efficient practices to minimize resource consumption and contribute to a greener future.

power.title: Power
power.description: Our data centers' Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE) is measured and audited every 12 months. Values measured closer to 1 indicate more efficient energy consumption.

water.title: Water
water.description: The metric measures how efficiently water is used; values closer to 0 indicate optimal performance.

carbon.title: Carbon
carbon.description: This tracks direct emissions and indirect commissions from electricity use, with values closest to 0 representing better performance.

renewables.title: Renewables
renewables.description: This refers to the percentage of Renewable Energy Factor (REF) rates used in our data centers.

FeatureSection.title: How we commit to a sustainable future
FeatureSection.description: By advancing green initiatives, we aim to protect the planet and strive for a cleaner, more green cloud storage solution by 2025.

reduceCarbonEnergy.title: Reduce carbon energy
reduceCarbonEnergy.description: By 2025, the centers we use will limit their reliance on carbon energy, switching to more renewable and lower-carbon energy sources, such as nuclear and hydroelectricity.

globalNetZero.title: Global NetZero
globalNetZero.description: We are committed to achieving zero net emissions for Scope 1 (direct emissions from fuel) and Scope 2 (indirect emissions from electricity). 2023 will cover all other indirect emissions.

zeroWaste.title: Zero waste
zeroWaste.description: To reduce the environmental impact of landfill disposal and promote green initiatives, we are committed to zero waste to landfill by 2025 across all our server locations.
